text: Kodi inu simunamve nkhani za anthu a Nowa, Aad, ndi Thamoud omwe adalipo inu musanadze? Ndiponso za iwo amene adadza pambuyo pawo? Palibe adziwa za iwo kupatula Mulungu yekha. Atumwi awo adadza kwa iwo ndi zizindikiro zooneka koma iwo adatseka pakamwa pawo ndi manja awo ndipo adati, “Ndithudi ife sitikhulupirira mu zimene mwatumidwa, ndithudi ife tili ndi chikaiko pazimene mukutiitanira.”
